meta_data.description: Amazon.com: COMOWARE 20V Cordless Drill, Electric Power Drill Set with 1 Battery & Charger, 3/8” Keyless Chuck, 2 Variable Speed, 266 In-lb Torque, 25+1 Position and 34pcs Drill/Driver Bits : Tools & Home Improvement

feature_bullets: 【20 Voltage & 2 Variable Speeds】 Higher voltage means more torque-spinning strength to overcome resistance. This 2 variable-speed ( 0-350 & 0-1300 RPM ) cordless drill with an adjustable clutch gives you the versatility for drilling different materials and using a variety of bits. The low speed is for driving screws, the high speed is for drilling holes.

【25+1 Position Clutch & 266 In-lbs Max Torque】 This cordless drill's clutch provides precise control for drilling, which helps to prevent sinking a screw too deep, stripping out the head of a screw or even breaking a screw shaft. 17-Torque allows for various applications and additional 1-torque for drilling.

【1500mAh Batteries & 60min Fast Charger】20V 1500mAh Lithium-Ion battery packed with higher capacity indicator lets you finish your job smoothly with long lasting performance. 1.5A 1-hour fast charger keeps your drill constantly running.

【3/8” Keyless Metal Chuck & LED Work Light】A 3/8-inch cordless drill accepts a wide range of bits, making it versatile for common tasks around the house. Drill has keyless chuck that you can tighten or loosen by hand. The Forward/Reverse switch allows you to either screw or replace/remove bits for your purposes. LED Light for increased visibility in enclosed workspaces and dark environment.

【23 Pcs Drill Bits Accessories & Compact Storage Case】Our electric cordless drill/ driver kit with 23 Pcs accessories: 3 x HSS Twist drill bits, 3 x Brad Point drill bits, 16 x Screwdriver bits, 9 x Sleeves, 1 x Extension Bar, 1 x Flexible Hex Shaft. A storage case is suitable for home Improvement & DIY Project.

specifications.Included Components: ‎[1]20V Cordless drill [1]Battery [3]HSS Twist drill bits [3]Brad Point drill bits [3]Masonry drill bits [11]Screwdriver bits [2]Double-headed bits [1]Flexible Hex Shaft [1]Fast charger [1]Storage case
